Description.Name: Repaired Power Conduits
Description.Details: Running power through patched-together runs of cable all over the decks isnâ€™t reliable or safe. We will need to run new electrical cable in the existing conduits get more systems working on the Argo because you just can't run anymore patched power.

AssignedCastDescription: Notably, upgrading the power system will allow us to provide power to more parts of the ship reliably, which means more of the Argo's systems are operational.
